title: Ahmaud Arbery Trial Defendant Describes Moments After Shooting
sub_head: ‘I just killed a man. I had blood on me still,’ Travis McMichael testified of his agitated state while talking to police
body:
The Georgia man who killed Ahmaud Arbery faced questioning on the stand Thursday about his statements to police after the February 2020 shooting and what he knew of the 25-year-old man before engaging in an armed pursuit.
In his second day on the witness stand in his murder trial at the county courthouse in Brunswick, Ga., Travis McMichael described to the jury his agitated state talking to police in the immediate hours after shooting Mr. Arbery with his 12-gauge shotgun.
